response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional value and quality, we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs and expectations. We are offering this remarkable item to you at a special price of $950,000. This offer reflects our commitment to finding the right buyer who truly appreciates the product's worth. We trust that you will find this proposal attractive and look forward to discussing the details further with you.", "product_price": 950000}
